name: Google Play Music Re-Redesigned
description: Shrunk the play bar and allowed the queue to take up most of the screen.  Also, a couple other improvements.  Lemme know if you have any more suggestions.
additional_info:
-Queue takes up the whole screen
-Play bar takes up less of the screen.

BUGS:
-The queue is partially covered if open on the "My Library" page.  Keep it on the "Listen Now" page to fix.
